title: Commerce Metrics
description: Quantifiable measures used to track and assess the status of a commerce business process.

xdm:productViews.title: Product Views
xdm:productViews.description: Number of views of a product has occurred. (same as productView in Adobe Analytics).

xdm:productListOpens.title: Product List Opens
xdm:productListOpens.description: Number of opens, initializations of a new product list has occurred. (same as scOpen in Adobe Analytics).

xdm:productListAdds.title: Product List Adds
xdm:productListAdds.description: Number of adds of a product to the product list has occurred. (same as scAdd in Adobe Analytics).

xdm:productListRemovals.title: Product List Removals
xdm:productListRemovals.description: Number of removals of a product entry from a product list has occurred. (same as scRemove in Adobe Analytics).

xdm:productListViews.title: Product List Views
xdm:productListViews.description: Number of views of a product list has occurred. (same as scView in Adobe Analytics)

xdm:saveForLaters.title: Save for Laters
xdm:saveForLaters.description: Number of requests to save a product list for a future session.

xdm:checkouts.title: Checkouts
xdm:checkouts.description:
Number of actions during a checkout process of a product list, there can be more than one checkout event if there are multiple steps in a checkout
process. If there are multiple steps the event time information and
referenced page or experience is used to identify the step individual
events represent in order.

xdm:abandons.title: Abandons
xdm:abandons.description: Number of abandons for which a product list has been identified as no longer purchasable or accessible by the user without the user re-creating the product list from scratch.

xdm:productListReopens.title: Product List Reopens
xdm:productListReopens.description: Number of reopens for which a product list that was no longer accessible has been re-activated by the user, for example via a re-marketing activity.

xdm:purchases.title: Purchases
xdm:purchases.description: Number of orders has occurred. purchase is the only required action in a commerce conversion. Purchase must have a product list referenced. (same as Adobe Analytics)
